title: Documentation - Method: projects.glossaries.get
abstract:
# Documentation - Method: projects.glossaries.get
Gets a glossary. Returns NOT_FOUND, if the glossary doesn't exist.
#
content:
## HTTP request`GET https://{TRANSLATION_GDCH_ENDPOINT}/v3/{name}`
### Path parameters| Parameters | Parameters.1           |
|:-------------|:-------------------------------------------------------|
| name   | string Required. The name of the glossary to retrieve. |
### Request bodyThe request body must be empty.
### Response bodyIf successful, the response body contains an instance of ` [Glossary](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/apis/vertex-ai/translation/rest/v3/projects.glossaries#Glossary) ` .
